channel.title: Some Questions
channel.description:
Ok so Im making a custom source from scratch, and i was wondering if i how to do the following things:
1. ZymusScape -> Skills -> RuneCrafting.java -> public class RuneCrafting extends Client Q: How do i make it so that i make the Client.java the parent class from the classpath?
2. [code]DeleteAll(Essence); AddRunes(AirRunes, EssenceAmount);[/code] Q: How would i make a boolean that would check how many rune ess i have and add that many air runes. (AddRunes(int RuneID, int Amount))
3. [code]AddRunes(AirRunes, EssenceAmount*2)[/code]? Q: how would i multiply an item amount that i get, without know the entire item amount?
that's all that i can think of right now all help is appreciated.
~ ~ Zyle269952 ~ ~

item.title: Some Questions
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

so for the first one to work, i need to successfully compile RUneCrafting.java right?

item.title: Some Questions
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

1. ZymusScape -> Skills -> RuneCrafting.java -> public class RuneCrafting extends Client Q: How do i make it so that i make the Client.java the parent class from the classpath? A: You have to go on the appropriate folder wich is called the aparatasus.class, if u dont got it download it, i might put the link on my sig later not now.

Code:
DeleteAll(Essence);
AddRunes(AirRunes, EssenceAmount);Q: How would i make a boolean that would check how many rune ess i have and add that many air runes. (AddRunes(int RuneID, int Amount))

Code:
AddRunes(AirRunes, EssenceAmount*2)?
Q: how would i multiply an item amount that i get, without know the entire item amount?
A: Easy, left click, click on send to, essence.java, then go there and click on open and put this there “/32/” (as many as u want to copy) then you got it as many as you want, if u want it to do it by it self, u gata download a program, i will have the link on my sig later, not now

ThE UnKnOwN

please do not listen to him for he is a big NOOB!

i will help you with the first question…

compile your script and its the .class file

secondly im currently working on the same problem with making it so it checks the inv for the amount of ess once i find i’ll pm u but i also got to figure how to make it so if they have no essence to say you do not have enough essence
